name: 2fas-browser-extension
description: This is the official Browser Extension for the Open Source 2FAS project.

scripts.chrome-dev: yon clean && yon generate-locales && npx -y cross-env EXT_PLATFORM=Chrome node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode development --progress --config webpack/development.config.js
scripts.chrome-prod: yon clean && yon generate-locales && yon browserlist-update && npx -y cross-env EXT_PLATFORM=Chrome NODE_ENV=production node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode production --progress --config webpack/production.config.js
scripts.chrome-build: yon chrome-prod && npx -y rimraf ./public/.gitkeep && yon check-build-directory && npx -y cross-env PLATFORM=Chrome yon zip-build
scripts.opera-dev: yon clean && yon generate-locales && npx -y cross-env EXT_PLATFORM=Opera node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode development --progress --config webpack/development.config.js
scripts.opera-prod: yon clean && yon generate-locales && yon browserlist-update && npx -y cross-env EXT_PLATFORM=Opera NODE_ENV=production node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode production --progress --config webpack/production.config.js
scripts.opera-build: yon opera-prod && npx -y rimraf ./public/.gitkeep && yon check-build-directory && npx -y cross-env PLATFORM=Opera yon zip-build
scripts.firefox-dev: yon clean && yon generate-locales && npx -y cross-env EXT_PLATFORM=Firefox node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode development --progress --config webpack/development.config.js
scripts.firefox-prod: yon clean && yon generate-locales && yon browserlist-update && npx -y cross-env EXT_PLATFORM=Firefox NODE_ENV=production node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode production --progress --config webpack/production.config.js
scripts.firefox-build: yon firefox-prod && npx -y rimraf ./public/.gitkeep && yon check-build-directory && npx -y cross-env PLATFORM=Firefox yon zip-build
scripts.edge-dev: yon clean && yon generate-locales && npx -y cross-env EXT_PLATFORM=Edge node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode development --progress --config webpack/development.config.js
scripts.edge-prod: yon clean && yon generate-locales && yon browserlist-update && npx -y cross-env EXT_PLATFORM=Edge NODE_ENV=production node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode production --progress --config webpack/production.config.js
scripts.edge-build: yon edge-prod && npx -y rimraf ./public/.gitkeep && yon check-build-directory && npx -y cross-env PLATFORM=Edge yon zip-build
scripts.safari-dev: yon clean && yon generate-locales && npx -y cross-env EXT_PLATFORM=Safari node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode development --progress --config webpack/development.config.js
scripts.safari-prod: yon clean && yon generate-locales && yon browserlist-update && npx -y cross-env EXT_PLATFORM=Safari NODE_ENV=production node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode production --progress --config webpack/production.config.js
scripts.all-build: npx -y rimraf --glob ./build/* && yon generate-license-info && yon chrome-build && yon opera-build && yon firefox-build && yon edge-build
scripts.zip-build: cd ./public/ && npx -y cross-var npx -y bestzip ../build/$PLATFORM_ext_$npm_package_version.zip * & cd ..
